connectorUiConfig.title: CTERA Syslog
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown:
The CTERA Data Connector for Microsoft Sentinel offers monitoring and threat detection capabilities for your CTERA solution.
 It includes a workbook visualizing the sum of all operations per type, deletions, and denied access operations.
 It also provides analytic rules which detects ransomware incidents and alert you when a user is blocked due to suspicious ransomware activity.
 Additionally, it helps you identify critical patterns such as mass access denied events, mass deletions, and mass permission changes, enabling proactive threat management and response.

sampleQueries.description: Query to find all denied operations.
sampleQueries.query:
Syslog
| where ProcessName == 'gw-audit'
| extend TenantName = extract("(\"vportal\":\"[^\"]*\")", 1, SyslogMessage), UserName = extract("(user=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| extend Permission = extract("(op=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| where Permission matches regex @"(?i).*denied.*"
| summarize Count = count() by Permission

sampleQueries.description: Query to find all delete operations.
sampleQueries.query:
Syslog
| where ProcessName == 'gw-audit'
| extend TenantName = extract("(\"vportal\":\"[^\"]*\")", 1, SyslogMessage), UserName = extract("(user=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| extend Permission = extract("(op=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| where Permission == "op=delete"
| summarize Count = count() by Permission

| where ProcessName == 'gw-audit'
| extend TenantName = extract("(\"vportal\":\"[^\"]*\")", 1, SyslogMessage), UserName = extract("(user=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| extend Permission = extract("(op=[^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage)
| summarize Count = count() by UserName, Permission

| summarize Count = count() by TenantName, Permission

| project TimeGenerated, Portal, EdgeFiler, IP, User, IncidentType, StartTime, EndTime

properties.description: CTERA Mass Access Denied Detection Analytics Rule with template version 1.0.0
This analytic rule detects and alerts when access denied operations generated by the CTERA Edge Filer goes over a predefined threshold.
properties.displayName: CTERA Mass Access Denied Detection Analytic
properties.query:
Syslog
| where ProcessName == 'gw-audit'
| extend
    TenantName = extract("\"vportal\":\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage),
    UserName = extract("user=([^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage),
    Operation = extract("op=([^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage),
    EdgeFiler = extract("\"client\":\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage),
    RootPath = extract("rootPath=([^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage),
    Share = extract("share=([^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage),
    LocalPath = extract("path=([^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage),
    Timestamp = todatetime(extract("\"@timestamp\":\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage))
| where Operation in ('OpenDenied', 'createDenied', 'AclDenied', 'deleteDenied')
| summarize Count = count() by bin(Timestamp, 5m), UserName, EdgeFiler
| where Count > 1000

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Detected {{Count}} denied access attempts by user {{UserName}} on Edge Filer {{EdgeFiler}} within 5 minutes. Please investigate unauthorized access attempts or misconfigurations.

properties.query:
Syslog
  | where ProcessName == 'gw-audit'
  | extend
      TenantName = extract("\"vportal\":\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage),
      UserName = extract("user=([^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage),
      Operation = extract("op=([^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage),
      EdgeFiler = extract("\"client\":\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage),
      RootPath = extract("rootPath=([^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage),
      Share = extract("share=([^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage),
      LocalPath = extract("path=([^|]*)", 1, SyslogMessage),
      Timestamp = todatetime(extract("\"@timestamp\":\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage))
  | where Operation in ('ACLAdded', 'ACLDeleted', 'ACLProtectionAdded','chown', 'setsd', 'ACLProtectionDeleted', 'ACEChanged', 'setdacl')
  | summarize Count = count() by UserName, bin(Timestamp, 5m)
  | where Count > 5000
